ygData.subject: RANTZ!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: OK-- hm... I wanna buy 10kpp for $100, please e-mail me. GRRRRR oooohhh... I wanna be an Uber Twink Lvl 3 druid so I can be the scourge of GFay and be the
ygData.messageBody:
OK-- "hm... I wanna buy 10kpp for $100, please
e-mail me." GRRRRR "oooohhh... I wanna be an Uber Twink
Lvl 3 druid so I can be the scourge of GFay and be
the only 200WIS druid who /cons green to N00bs." I'm
sorry, this kind of blatant twinking ruins the game for
me.<br><br>Minor Rant-- I know that we all are assumed to like
RPGs and other computer games, but why are all these
Clubs hit with all the "come try my new game" "come
beta test this hot new game"? Don't they understand
that we're all addicted to EQ?? Giving up EQ to try
your new "hot" game would be like passing up driving a
Ferrari to ride shotgun in a Nova. <br><br>And why aren't
there any good mid level quests for Druids? Does
verrant think we really want a "Wee Harvester"? OMG-- i
can already summon my own food and drink (or forage
it), so why do I want to carry around a 2hb shovel???
<br><br>And why do Enchanters have to run all the way to HH
to get pet spells? The pets suck anyway, but I need
all the help i can get at lvl 8. So I have to go from
Gfay to HH??? <br><br>And what's the deal with stop
lights?? There's too many of them in my town and they
always seem to turn red whenever I get close to
them!!!<br><br>And why does airplane food have to be so bad? Is it
so hard to figure out how to get decent food on an
airplane, heat it up and serve it so we can tell the
difference between chicken and fish???<br><br>And what's the
deal with this itchy rash I've got? Should I go see a
doctor, or just cover it with a band-aid and hope it goes
away!!!???<br><br>/Xela goes into a Berzerker rage<br>/Xela Calms down
